general: Download the ITC Vegas app for real-time event updates
Most events included with registration except special workshops
Comfortable shoes are essential - you'll walk 15,000+ steps daily
Hydrate between drinks - Las Vegas is dry
networking: Use the app to schedule 1:1 meetings in advance
Best networking happens at coffee breaks, not sessions
Join the WhatsApp groups for your interest areas
Breakfast meetings are less crowded than evening events
Follow up within 48 hours while connections are fresh
parties: Opening party: arrive early, leave late
Closing party: don't miss the awards at 8 PM
Happy hours: different sponsors each day
Quiet networking spaces available at all parties
VIP areas typically on upper levels
